With decades of experience in delivering excellence, Cybage is consistently moving forward—fusing exceptional talent, efficient processes, and emerging technologies to thrive in the ever-changing business terrain.

At the heart of our unparalleled service lies ExcelShore®, our in-house platform that transforms the delivery ecosystem. Backed by profound thought leadership, ExcelShore® empowers us to move forward with a data-driven approach, guaranteeing our clients' maximum satisfaction and tangible returns on investment.
From ideation to launch, our comprehensive suite of product engineering services and solutions helps bring your products to life.
With a rich legacy of transformative technology solutions, we forge ahead, adapting to the dynamic needs of industries worldwide.
Leverage the power of AI to unlock your competitive edge, no matter where you stand in your AI journey.
Ensure enhanced productivity and scalability with our extensive set of services, tailored to elevate your capabilities.
The digital landscape is rapidly evolving. We help you stay ahead and simplify the way your business moves.

Deliver high-performance outcomes with managed GCCs—smart, scalable, and tailored to your strategic goals.
Digital solutions for private equity firms that drive growth, enhance performance, streamline operations, and scale impact.
Moving with the Times, Moving with You
Cybage goes beyond intuition. We make informed decisions, leverage deep industry knowledge to craft bespoke solutions and optimize your business performance.
Experience the power of data-driven insights for tangible results with ExcelShore®
Meet PIE—our design thinking approach with automation at its core to address your software development challenges.

Everywhere in the business world, the power of digital disruptions has been providing a transformative edge to those who understand them. One would hence assume that IT service pioneers with a knack for digital know-how should be the leading transformers of their own environments.
At Cybage, we put people first, embrace change and act with integrity to create a culture of excellence.

Whether it’s engineering, consulting, sales and marketing, or anything else, apply your skills and be a part of the environment that supports you every step of the way. All we want—is for you to have a fulfilling and rewarding experience with us.

In an era characterized by constant change, software product companies and organizations alike must keep pace with the rapid shift in client demands. For them to remain ahead of the curve, it is essential that they integrate modern technologies, agile methodologies, and customer-focused design while bringing products to life.

A global leader with a decades-long legacy of Product Engineering, Cybage stands at the forefront of innovation and offers a comprehensive suite of services designed to empower businesses pursuing market-leading products.
Leveraging our engineering DNA, we assist you through every stage of the
process, offering end-to-end software product lifecycle management from conceptualization to
sustained engineering
. Our seasoned team uses agile approaches to deliver solutions that are specifically matched to your industry's demands and can swiftly adjust to shifting market dynamics.
Whether you’re looking for a novel idea or a ground-breaking fix for an existing product, our expertise in Digital Product Engineering puts us in a position to help you create sustainable products.
Move with us as we engineer the future together with winning products.
Turn your concepts into reality with our concept & ideation services. We help you refine your initial concept, conduct market research, and develop a clear product roadmap.
Experience innovation at its best with our research, design & development services. We collaborate closely with your team to deliver a winning product, that addresses market needs.
Ensure the reliability of your products with our test engineering services. Our rigorous testing processes guarantee the quality and performance of your products.
Secure the longevity of your products with our sustained engineering services. We ensure your products evolve and adapt to meet changing demands.
Revitalize your existing products with our re-engineering services. We bring a fresh perspective to enhance and modernize your product offerings.
Unlock a smooth transition with our migration services. We specialize in migrating your products to new platforms, ensuring continuity and improved performance.
Count on Cybage for reliable support. Our support & reliability services ensure your products operate seamlessly, providing a positive user experience.
Empower your teams and users with our documentation & training services. We ensure comprehensive resources and training materials for optimal product utilization.

Cybage, with its rich legacy, is a true embodiment of delivery excellence. We blend innovation and deep domain knowledge to propel your business. Through automation and data-driven decision-making, we consistently improve our processes to deliver value.

Our utmost priority, at Cybage, is ensuring your success. Our client-centric approach helps us address your business needs with the most appropriate technological solution. Our team learns the complexities of your business to ensure the solution can serve its purpose.

At Cybage, we don't simply provide solutions; we build strategic alliances with leading technology platforms to help you revolutionize your business. Together, we co-create ground-breaking solutions that result in profitable outcomes.

At Cybage, security and compliance are ingrained in our DNA. We use industry-leading frameworks to protect your data and maintain adherence to standards and regulations, creating a secure environment—giving you peace of mind.

Our global reach, coupled with local expertise, caters to diverse business needs worldwide. Cybage navigates the business landscape, offering solutions that resonate with your target audience. Together, we move forward, bridging the gap between global aspirations and local nuances.
Moving With The Times, Moving With You

paragraphs: We offer end-to-end Oracle Cloud transformation, migration, integration, automation, and managed services.
Oracle Commerce’s decline demands transition to modern, composable, microservices-based commerce strategies.
Discover roles designed to take your career further, anywhere in the world.
Zensar has earned the AWS Data and Analytics Competency, validating its deep expertise in enabling customers to achieve measurable outcomes from cloud-based data and analytics initiatives.
Discover the deeper purpose that drives us to go beyond business as usual.
We offer end-to-end Oracle Cloud transformation, migration, integration, automation, and managed services.
Oracle Commerce’s decline demands transition to modern, composable, microservices-based commerce strategies.
Discover roles designed to take your career further, anywhere in the world.
Zensar has earned the AWS Data and Analytics Competency, validating its deep expertise in enabling customers to achieve measurable outcomes from cloud-based data and analytics initiatives.
Discover the deeper purpose that drives us to go beyond business as usual.

As creators, thinkers, and problem solvers, we are dedicated to meeting all your needs at any stage of your journey. Whether you’re building digital products, creating brands and market experiences, or managing services, applications, and infrastructure, we’re with you from start to finish. Guided by our “experience-led everything” strategy, our unique blend of experience, engineering, and engagement sets us apart, giving you an unrivaled competitive edge.

From ideas to execution, our services are meticulously crafted to tackle your most pressing business challenges and deliver lasting outcomes, all with a focus on enhancing the experience for you and your customers.
Comprehensive app lifecycle services that boost performance, improve user experience, and power seamless enterprise integration.
AI solutions that transform data into actionable insights — empowering smarter decisions, greater efficiency, faster innovation, and new growth opportunities.
Cloud, core, and edge consulting and management services that protect and connect ecosystems, boost performance, and enhance the end-client experience.
End-to-end data and AI services that turn complexity into clarity — unlocking insights, intelligence, and innovation.
Storytelling-led experiences that combine strategy, design, and media to connect with your audience in the moments that matter.
Product and brand transformation services that support the full lifecycle — from early-stage innovation to next-gen platform shifts.
Transformation begins with experience — and our clients are at the heart of it.

Sandile Sikhondze, CIB - Head of Technology Payments at Standard Bank, shares how Zensar’s journey from a staff augmentation vendor to a strategic managed services partner brought greater stability, increased productivity, and deeper alignment with the bank’s long-term vision.

In this candid reflection, Matt Lamb, CIO of Rosendin, reveals how a decade-long partnership with Zensar transformed their Oracle ERP landscape — streamlining systems, minimizing risk, and driving measurable business value.

Antony Hausdoerfer, Group CIO at The AA, reflects on a partnership built on trust, collaboration, and shared outcomes — highlighting how Zensar has been integral to delivering complex, high-impact projects, bringing not just skills but a true team spirit that feels like an extension of The AA itself.
We work with industries that impact daily life and shape what’s next — creating great experiences and solving big challenges together.
Discover the stories that show how we're transforming businesses through our expertise, digital transformation, and much more.
Cloud Infrastructure and Security
Data Engineering and Analytics
Data Engineering and Analytics
Product and Platforms
Advanced Engineering Services
Cloud Infrastructure and Security

People are at the heart of Zensar, and every experience we create begins with you.
This is your place to grow, lead, and make a lasting impact.
Stay ahead with the latest updates or kick off an exciting conversation with us today!

products.title: Consumer services: Retail and Consumer Technology Solutions | Zensar Technologies
products.meta_description: Elevate your retail and cpg business with innovative consumer services and advanced tech solutions that transform customer experiences and drive engagement.

h2: What we offer to help you grow
Client stories that speak for themselves
h3: Transforming Merchandise Management With Google Cloud

paragraphs: Stay ahead with the latest updates or kick off an exciting conversation with us today!
Transforming how brands engage, delight, and grow with the consumers of tomorrow.
We empower global businesses to thrive in today’s dynamic consumer ecosystem. With deep expertise across retail, travel, hospitality,
quick service restaurants (QSRs),
supply chain, digital commerce, logistics, store systems, point of sale (POS), and merchandising, we enable greater agility, efficiency, and customer delight.

Our experience-led approach reduces operational costs and drives end-to-end transformation — modernizing systems, leveraging data and AI, and meeting evolving consumer expectations across every touchpoint.
Enabling consumer brands to drive growth with experience-led digital transformation, combining data, AI, and industry expertise to enhance agility, innovation, and consumer engagement.
Reimagining the future of digital commerce through an experience lens.
Gen AI retail suite boosts agility, reduces costs, and enhances CX with smart, scalable tools.
Boost warehouse efficiency with Zensar’s smart warehouse management system (WMS) powered by automation, insights, and flexibility.
Gain real-time, AI-led supply chain visibility and insights for faster, smarter decisions.
Reimagining retail with agile, AI-led merchandising for faster, smarter, seamless operations.
Streamlining retail operations and driving efficiency and insights to improve customer experiences.
Deliver unified, enriched product experiences with Zensar’s agile, headless PIM solution.
Enhancing consumer experiences with integrated sales, inventory, fast checkouts, real-time promotions, and omnichannel support.
Enhance contact center efficiency with a smart bot for fraud control and faster resolutions.

Experience seamless retail transactions with our advanced POS solution. It enables secure payments, real-time data access, effortless integration, and omnichannel capabilities, enhancing operations and customer satisfaction across all touchpoints.

Modernize commerce beyond Oracle ATG with our strategic transition roadmap, enabling agile delivery, reduced costs, MACH-based scalability, and future-ready digital experiences across every touchpoint.
Boosting process efficiency and enhancing operational performance.
Enabled a major US department store chain to enhance business agility, boost efficiency, and reduce infrastructure costs by 40% to 45% through supply chain and application modernization.
Transformed a leading retail tech provider's legacy suite into a cloud-based, mobile-first omnichannel platform, accelerating time-to-market by reducing regression testing cycles by 90%.

Discover how we modernized a South African retailer’s merchandise management system on Google Cloud, integrating business and engineering innovations to enhance scalability, agility, and support sustainable growth.

Zensar and ServiceNow collaborated to help a large retailer streamline asset classification for audits, unify disparate data sources into a single source of truth, and automate asset tracking across multiple locations, enhancing procurement efficiency and regulatory compliance.
Zensar earned Gartner’s Honorable Mention for Custom Software Development Services in 2024.
Marketing and Engagement
Artificial Intelligence
Cloud, Infrastructure, and Security
Data Engineering and Analytics
Products and Platforms
Executive Vice President - Manufacturing and Consumer Services, and Chief Growth Officer
Senior Vice President and Global Delivery Head
Vice President, Manufacturing and Consumer Services
Vice President and Delivery Head
Associate Vice President and Global Head - Industry Solutions Group, MCS
Associate Vice President - Product Engineering
Associate Vice President and Head of Merchandising and Travel, Leisure, and Hospitality GTM and Partnerships and Alliances

In the fast-moving world of consumer services, we bring the perfect balance — big enough to scale with confidence, yet small enough to care deeply. We’re fiercely passionate but refreshingly kind — zealots for delivering exceptional experiences, without the ego. What sets us apart is our authenticity. We show up as ourselves: genuine, straightforward, and human. We lead with pride, not pressure; fuel progress through collaboration, not competition. People aren’t resources to us — they’re the reason we exist. We work hard, laugh often, and look out for one another because we believe growth should be a shared journey. At the heart of our vertical is a simple truth: happy employees create happy clients. For us, employee happiness isn’t a metric — it’s a way of life.

homepage.title: LTIMindtree - Technology Consulting and Digital Solutions Company
homepage.meta_description: LTIMindtree is a global technology consulting and digital solutions company that enables enterprises across industries to reimagine business models, accelerate innovation, and maximize growth by harnessing digital technologies.

h2: LTIMindtree is recognized as an “Innovator” in Avasant Healthcare Provider Digital Services 2025 RadarView™
Architecting Your Future: Unlocking Scalable Enterprise AI with Robust Infrastructure
A Roadmap to Driving Enterprise Value in an Agentic Future
Enterprises must embrace AI to reimagine their future, not tinker in the margins
h3: Transaction Approved: How Europe's Leading Payments Processor Quickened Payments Across the Continent
Boosting campaign efficiency by 40%: AI-Powered Campaigns for a Financial Powerhouse
Burns and McDonell’s data transformation with LTIMindtree & Microsoft Azure
Driving Sustainability through Cloud Transformation for OKQ8
Revolutionizing data management with LTIMindtree and Microsoft Azure

paragraphs: We are grateful to the authorities for the swift passage of the proposed transaction through statutory processes and for its approval in a record time. This integration is much more than just the coming together of two highly successful companies. It is about turning the collective wisdom of the two companies into a much larger force for creating long-term value for all our stakeholders.

Amid the proliferation of new business models and revenue streams in a rapidly converging world, LTIMindtree will help businesses proactively take on and shape the future by harnessing the full power of digital technologies. Armed with top talent, comprehensive offerings, and a cumulative experience of more than five decades, LTIMindtree brings the diversity of scale and capabilities required to help businesses reimagine possibilities, deliver impact, and get to the future, faster.

LTIMindtree is a new kind of technology consulting company. We help businesses transform – from core to experience – to thrive in the marketplace of the future. With a unique blend of the engineering DNA with experience DNA, LTIMindtree helps businesses get to the future, faster.

Mr. Stavros Ioannou, Deputy CEO, Group COO & International Activities, highlights that their partnership with LTIMindtree enables them to deliver IT services aligned with their customers’ needs, no matter where they are.

Béatrice Mabille, VP Internal IT of Criteo discusses the indispensable support of LTIMindtree to reach their objectives: cost efficiency operating model, a strong reliability to have time to focus on the projects and maximizing the value.

LTIMindtree played a pivotal role in evaluating risks and ensuring a successful migration within budget and schedule. Post-acquisition, AMBA flourished, serving over 450 affinity groups with an expanded product portfolio

LTIMindtree played a pivotal role in Gen Re's cloud migration journey, addressing scale challenges and geographic diversity with a highly skilled team. Their comprehensive approach ensured a seamless transition, meeting Gen Re's objectives successfully. Erik Kasir, VP at Gen Re, commended LTIMindtree for their strategic selection, effective risk mitigation, and collaborative teamwork.

Johan Gabrielsson, Head of Digital Products & Services at OKQ8, talks about their long-lasting partnership with LTIMindtree in Digital Products & Platforms. The association has expanded from early IT development to creating innovative apps for sustainable mobility. OKQ8 and LTIMindtree's partnership has now shifted towards a strategic emphasis on harnessing data to make substantial advancements in the digital arena.

Giving wings to one’s business in turbulent skies seems to be the mantra for the CIO of Lufthansa Cargo AG - Jochen Gottelmann. He speaks about how Lufthansa Cargo responded to the pandemic with agility and resilience, and how LTIMindtree helped drive it’s ESB middleware transformation. In Jochen’s words, LTIMindtree has proven to be a reliable, competent, scalable & trustworthy partner – both, in good times and in not so good times.
David Johnston, CIO of Messer Americas talks about their digital transformation and how LTIMindtree has played a key role to bring technology leadership and innovations.
Our API-driven infrastructure ensured Payment Services Directive 2 compliance and enhanced operational efficiency.
Modernized the client’s campaign and performance marketing strategy, cutting operational costs by 50% with an AI-powered automation solutions.
In collaboration with LTIMindtree and Microsoft Azure, Burns & McDonnell is developing domain data products that empower data stewards to harness advanced technologies.
OKQ8's Azure journey exemplifies sustainability and innovation, setting new standards in responsible business practices.
Burns & McDonnell taps into LTIMindtree’s expertise and Microsoft Azure to transform data stewardship, enabling impactful insights and smarter decisions across the organization.
LTIMindtree Wins India Green Award for Sustainability Reporting
LTIMindtree Named 2025 Databricks Business Transformation Partner of the Year at Data + AI Summit
LTIMindtree Wins 2025 Google Cloud Industry Solutions Partner of the Year Award in the Manufacturing category
LTIMindtree recognized as a Microsoft Security Excellence Awards winner for Diversity in Security
LTIMindtree included in S&P’s prestigious Sustainability Yearbook 2025

is a global technology consulting and digital solutions company that enables enterprises across industries to reimagine business models, accelerate innovation, and maximize growth by harnessing digital technologies. As a digital transformation partner to more than 700 clients, LTIMindtree brings extensive domain and technology expertise to help drive superior competitive differentiation, customer experiences, and business outcomes in a converging world. Powered by 87,000 talented and entrepreneurial professionals across more than 40 countries, LTIMindtree — a Larsen & Toubro Group company — solves the most complex business challenges and delivers transformation at scale. For more information, please visit
https://www.ltimindtree.com/

We use necessary cookies to make our site work. We'd also like to set optional analytics cookies to help us improve it. We won't set optional cookies unless you enable them. Using this tool will set a cookie on your device to remember your preferences.
For more detailed information about the cookies we use, see our
Strictly Necessary Cookies

Strictly necessary cookies are those that are essential for our sites to work in the way you have requested. You may disable these by changing your browser settings, but this may affect how the website functions.
For more detailed information about the cookies we use, see our
Performance/Analytics Cookies

Performance cookies, often called analytics cookies, collect data from visitors to our sites on a unique, but anonymous basis. The results are reported to us as aggregate numbers and trends. LTI allows third-parties to set performance cookies. We rely on reports to understand our audiences, and improve how our websites work.

We may use site performance cookies to remember your preferences for operational settings on our websites, so as to save you the trouble to reset the preferences every time you visit. For example, the cookie may recognize optimum video streaming speeds, or volume settings, or the order in which you look at comments to a posting on one of our forums. These cookies do not identify you as an individual and we don’t associate the resulting information with a cookie that does.
For more detailed information about the cookies we use, see our

If you use social media or other third-party credentials to log in to our sites, then that other organization may set a cookie that allows that company to recognize you. The social media organization may use that cookie for its own purposes. The Social Media Organization may also show you ads and content from us when you visit its websites.
For more detailed information about the cookies we use, see our
Targeting/Advertising Cookies

We use tracking and targeting cookies, or ask other companies to do so on our behalf, to send you emails and show you online advertising, which meet your business and professional interests. If you have registered on our websites, we may send you emails, tailored to reflect the interests you have shown during your visits.
For more detailed information about the cookies we use, see our

In Jochen’s words, LTIMindtree has proven to be a reliable, competent, scalable & trustworthy partner – both, in good times and in not so good times. Jochen Gottelmann CIO Messer Americas David Johnston, CIO of Messer Americas talks about their digital transformation and how LTIMindtree has played a key role to bring technology leadership and innovations. paragraphs: Reimagining customer experience through digital transformation
Leveraging Adobe Experience Cloud to deliver memorable customer experiences
LTIMindtree and Adobe share a common vision to help marketers deliver memorable customer experiences and drive growth.
The partnership brings together Adobe’s integrated technology platform and Mindtree’s service offerings for clients to accelerate their customer experience transformation journey.
https://www.adobe.com/
Enabling organization to optimize creative spending, processes, distribution management, and increase reuse, and velocity.
Digitizing processes to go paperless and deliver omnichannel end-user experience, while improving operational costs.
Evolving new revenue channels by implementing additional BAU operations with economy, scale and accelerated time-to-market.
Leveraging process-oriented marketing automation to improve ROI, and optimize operational costs and efficiencies.
We build integrated experience platforms by integrating experience layer with enterprise systems to improve conversion.
Mindtree awarded the “Omnichannel Experience Award” in 2018
Mindtree won the “Best Architecture Award” in the shoot to sight 2019 hackathon
Adobe is changing the world through digital experiences. They help customers create, deliver, and optimize content and applications.
This paper explores the common challenges and issues in creative processes and how they can be addressed using our proposed incremental and graded model.
Explore an incremental, step-by-step approach for implementing customer journey management for your organization.

about.title: About Us - LTIMindtree

h2: Powering Progress: Our Promise to Get Clients to The Future, Faster. Together.

paragraphs: The world is evolving rapidly with transformative technological advancements, dynamic changes in economies, and a shifting global landscape. These changes make it challenging for our people, clients, partners, and communities to navigate the evolving landscape. At LTIMindtree, we constantly push the boundaries of what’s possible by leveraging our expertise, experience, and innovative ecosystem to empower enterprises, people, and communities to build a better Future, Faster. Together. To achieve this, we drive business transformation using what we are good at—technology, talent, and a robust ecosystem of partners—to eliminate all barriers to progress. Our commitment is to a singular goal: to relentlessly ensure our clients become their future sustainable selves ahead of schedule.

We want to use technology to build intimacy, warmth, and empathy through the experiences we create. Our purpose is to unleash new possibilities and impact every human we touch. Our net-zero pledge leverages renewable energy, waste management, and a focus on the practices of a circular economy to ensure a healthier, safer, and more sustainable business.

Our vision lets us be as ambitious as we want to be. It allows us to think beyond what we did until yesterday. Today, we have become the catalyst that takes all our stakeholders to the future, faster. Together.

LTIMindtree's purpose is enshrined in our values and reflected in the mindfulness we bring to using technology and solving business problems. Purpose guides our actions; it shapes strategy and provides predictability to execution; it is the foundation for service excellence. Our clients, from across industries, geographies, and cultures, partner with us for what we do—and as much for why we do it. The purpose, vision, and values of LTIMindtree ensure we are committed to sustainable growth that propels our clients towards the future, faster - together.
Solve to Unleash Possibilities

is a global technology consulting and digital solutions company that enables enterprises across industries to reimagine business models, accelerate innovation, and maximize growth by harnessing digital technologies. As a digital transformation partner to more than 700 clients, LTIMindtree brings extensive domain and technology expertise to help drive superior competitive differentiation, customer experiences, and business outcomes in a converging world. Powered by 87,000 talented and entrepreneurial professionals across more than 40 countries, LTIMindtree — a Larsen & Toubro Group company — solves the most complex business challenges and delivers transformation at scale. For more information, please visit
https://www.ltimindtree.com/

We use necessary cookies to make our site work. We'd also like to set optional analytics cookies to help us improve it. We won't set optional cookies unless you enable them. Using this tool will set a cookie on your device to remember your preferences.
For more detailed information about the cookies we use, see our
Strictly Necessary Cookies

Strictly necessary cookies are those that are essential for our sites to work in the way you have requested. You may disable these by changing your browser settings, but this may affect how the website functions.
For more detailed information about the cookies we use, see our
Performance/Analytics Cookies

Performance cookies, often called analytics cookies, collect data from visitors to our sites on a unique, but anonymous basis. The results are reported to us as aggregate numbers and trends. LTI allows third-parties to set performance cookies. We rely on reports to understand our audiences, and improve how our websites work.

We may use site performance cookies to remember your preferences for operational settings on our websites, so as to save you the trouble to reset the preferences every time you visit. For example, the cookie may recognize optimum video streaming speeds, or volume settings, or the order in which you look at comments to a posting on one of our forums. These cookies do not identify you as an individual and we don’t associate the resulting information with a cookie that does.
For more detailed information about the cookies we use, see our

If you use social media or other third-party credentials to log in to our sites, then that other organization may set a cookie that allows that company to recognize you. The social media organization may use that cookie for its own purposes. The Social Media Organization may also show you ads and content from us when you visit its websites.
For more detailed information about the cookies we use, see our
Targeting/Advertising Cookies

We use tracking and targeting cookies, or ask other companies to do so on our behalf, to send you emails and show you online advertising, which meet your business and professional interests. If you have registered on our websites, we may send you emails, tailored to reflect the interests you have shown during your visits.
For more detailed information about the cookies we use, see our

Progress: Our Promise to Get Clients to The Future, Faster. Together. Home About Us The world is evolving rapidly with transformative technological advancements, dynamic changes in economies, and a shifting global landscape. These changes make it challenging for our people, clients, partners, and communities to navigate the evolving landscape. At LTIMindtree, we constantly push the boundaries of what’s possible by leveraging our expertise, experience, and innovative ecosystem to empower enterprises, people, and communities to build a better Future, Faster. Together. To achieve this, we drive business transformation using what we are good at—technology, talent, and a robust ecosystem of partners—to eliminate all barriers to progress. Our commitment is to a singular goal: to relentlessly ensure our clients become their future sustainable selves ahead of schedule. We want to use technology to build intimacy, warmth, and empathy through the experiences we create. Our purpose is to unleash new possibilities and impact every human we touch. Our net-zero pledge leverages renewable energy, waste management, and a focus on the practices of a circular economy to ensure a healthier, safer, and more sustainable business. Our vision lets us be as ambitious as we want to be. It allows us to think beyond what we did until yesterday. Today, we have become the catalyst that takes all our stakeholders to the future, faster. Together. LTIMindtree at a Glance $ 4.5 Bn + Revenue 700 + Clients 87,000 + Employees 40 + Countries LTIMindtree's purpose is enshrined in our values and reflected in the mindfulness we bring to using technology and solving business problems. Purpose guides our actions; it shapes strategy and provides predictability to execution; it is the foundation for service excellence. Our clients, from across industries, geographies, and cultures, partner with us for what we do—and as much for why we do it. The purpose, vision, and values of LTIMindtree ensure we are committed to sustainable growth that propels our clients towards the future, faster - together.
